dict.acceptation: 确保；担保获得[避免]；使（某人）获得；使安全；

sent.orig: Employee health management and ensure all activities ensure local environment, health and safety requirements.
sent.trans: 员工健康管理并确保所有的行为符合当地的健康、环境与安全的要求。

sent.orig: That is, procedures to ensure that pre-and post-procedure in order to ensure that.
sent.trans: 也就是前道工序保证了，后道工序才能保证。

sent.orig: Fault-cut paper to ensure its smooth edge featuring, to ensure that paper stability of the paper.
sent.trans: 断切纸张给包管其边缘划一、平滑，包管纸张的行纸安定性。

sent.orig: Make ensure the correct implementation of quality system production area to ensure the quality of products.
sent.trans: 确保正确实施质量体系，以保证产品的质量。

sent.orig: Ensure correct implementation of new and existing Divisional customer service structures, policies and processes.
sent.trans: 确保正确落实总部客户服务部门相关的新老架构、政策及流程。
